definition: Li county in Changde 常德[Chang2 de2], Hunan
Lishui River in north Hunan, flowing into Lake Dongting 洞庭湖/surname Li
county
Linli county in Changde 常德[Chang2 de2], Hunan

sentences.english: Lixian Vocational and Technical Institute, will always be for me, the number one institution in Hunan.
sentences.chinese: 澧县职业中专学校，对于我来说，是湖南的第一职校。

sentences.english: Quaternary Lixian sag is northwestern one of the secondary tectonic units of the Dongting basin.
sentences.chinese: 第四纪澧县凹陷为洞庭盆地西北部的一个次级凹陷。

sentences.english: The kind of gypsum mineral salt mineral deposited is more complete and the reserves are bigger in Lixian sag.
sentences.chinese: 其中澧县凹陷膏盐矿产种类较全，储量较大。

sentences.english: Practical application of oil pad process and its effect in Glauber Salt Mine of Li County is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了油垫法在澧县芒硝矿的实际应用情况以及效果。

sentences.english: Lixian County has a long history.
sentences.chinese: 澧县历史悠久，人文古远。
